trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 각로 표시 되는 레이블된 항목의 계층적 컬렉션을 표시 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that are assigned to the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>컬렉션 보관 모든는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>TreeView 컨트롤에 할당 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션의 트리 노드는 루트 트리 노드 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node.
trans-unit.target: 트리 루트 노드에 이후에 추가 된 트리 노드를 자식 노드 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Because each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can contain a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>다른 컬렉션을 포함할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>개체 하기 어려울 수 위치를 확인할 트리 구조의 컬렉션을 반복 하는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can parse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> string by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: 구문 분석할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>사용 하 여 문자열의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>문자열 값 위치를 결정 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>레이블의 시작 및 끝.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property and referencing the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to assign that <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 할당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>속성과 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>해당 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> 할당할</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 에서</xref:System.Drawing.Image> 인덱스 값을 참조 하</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 여 트리 노드 옆에 이미지를 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the following properties to assign images: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 이미지를 할당 하려면 다음 속성을 사용:-설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>속성의 인덱스 값을는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>트리 노드가 선택 되지 않은 경우 표시 하려는.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: -설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성의 인덱스 값을는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>트리 노드가 선택 된 때를 표시 하려는.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The images referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 참조 하는 이미지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성 값은에 할당 된 모든 트리 노드에 표시 되는 기본 이미지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 개별 트리 노드 기본 이미지를 설정 하 여 재정의할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the TreeView are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: TreeView에 표시 되는 상태 이미지는 기본적으로 16 x 16 픽셀입니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>이미지 표시 되는 방식에 영향을 미치지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 상태 이미지 크기를 조정할 시스템 DPI 설정에 따라 app.config 파일에 다음 항목이 포함 되어 있으면: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` 다음 수준의 자식 트리 노드를 표시 하려면 트리 노드를 확장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, or you can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용자를 확장할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>옆에 표시 되 면 더하기 기호 (+) 단추를 클릭 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, 하거나 확장할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>호출 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To expand all the child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 모든 자식 트리 노드 수준을 확장 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>컬렉션, 호출의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 하위 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>수준 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 옆에 표시 되 면 빼기 기호 (-) 단추를 눌러 메서드 또는 사용자 수</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 를 축소할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: 호출할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드를 확장 및 축소 된 상태로 대체.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드 확인란 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the TreeView to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 확인란을 표시 하려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>를 TreeView 속성 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>속성이 `true` 트리 노드의 선택된 상태에 있는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 설정은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 내에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>이벤트는 이벤트를 여러 번 발생 시키고 유효성 검사 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>재귀적으로 사용자를 확장 하 여 각각을 개별적으로 확인 보유 하지 않도록 자식 노드를 업데이트할 경우 이벤트 처리기에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 여러 번 발생 하지 않으려면 논리를 추가 하는 경우에 재귀 코드를 실행 하는 이벤트 처리기에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> events.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업을 수행 하는 방법의 예를 들어의 예 섹션을 참조 하십시오.는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>

trans-unit.source: You can change the appearance of the TreeView control by setting some of its display and style properties.
trans-unit.target: 표시 및 스타일 속성 중 일부를 설정 하 여 TreeView 컨트롤의 모양을 변경할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>를 `true` 각 옆의 더하기 기호나 빼기 기호가 단추를 표시 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>확장 되거나 축소 각각 수입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property to `true` causes the TreeView to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>속성을 `true` TreeView 모든 루트 트리 노드를 함께 조인 하는 줄을 표시 하면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 해당 루트 노드를 설정 하 여 자식 트리 노드를 연결 하는 선을 표시할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>속성을 `true` 마우스 포인터가 모양 트리 노드 레이블 위로 가져갈 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>

trans-unit.source: When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 핫 트랙는 트리 노드 레이블이 하이퍼링크 모양을 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 또한 완전히 TreeView 컨트롤의 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업을 수행 하려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>속성 이외의 값을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties at run time, the TreeView handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 설정할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>에서 속성을 런타임에, TreeView 핸들을 다시 만드는 (참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 컨트롤의 모양을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해 선택한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 제외 하 고 축소 하는 모든 트리 노드

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드 확인란이 선택 된 후 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or AfterCheck event handler causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 내에서 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>AfterCheck 이벤트 처리기를 여러 번 발생 이벤트를 발생 하 고 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 여러 번 발생 하지 않으려면 논리를 추가 하는 경우에 재귀 코드를 실행 하는 이벤트 처리기에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드가 축소 된 후 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node is expanded.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드 확인란이 선택 되기 전에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the BeforeCheck or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>는 BeforeCheck 내에서 속성 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>이벤트는 이벤트를 여러 번 발생 시키고 유효성 검사 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes, so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>사용자를 확장 하 여 각각을 개별적으로 확인 보유 하지 않는 재귀적으로 자식 노드를 업데이트할 수 있을 때는 이벤트 처리기에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 여러 번 발생 하지 않으려면 논리를 추가 하는 경우에 재귀 코드를 실행 하는 이벤트 처리기에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 되지 않은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disables any redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰의 다시 그리기를 비활성화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the BeginUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: 성능을 유지 하기 위해 항목을 한 번에 하나씩 추가 되는 동안는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, BeginUpdate 메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdate method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdate 메서드 때까지에서 컨트롤을 않도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤에 항목을 추가 하는 기본 방법은 사용 하는 것은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>메서드 트리 뷰를 트리 노드 항목의 배열입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 한 번에 한 항목을 추가 하려는 경우 BeginUpdate 하려면 메서드를 사용 하지 않도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤이 추가 작업 동안 그려지지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to resume painting, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 그리기를 다시 시작 하려면를 호출 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>메서드 모든 트리 노드 트리 뷰에 추가 되 면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤의 테두리 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the BorderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: BorderStyle 속성으로 설정 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>오목한,&3; 차원 모양이.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 평면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> 을 설정 하는 컨트롤</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 테두리를 표시 하려면

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 할당 된 값 중 하나이 고 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤의 트리 노드 옆에 있는 확인란을 표시할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 왼쪽의 트리 노드 레이블이 트리 노드 확인란이 표시는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>있는 경우.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time.
trans-unit.target: 확인란을 한 번에 여러 개의 트리 노드를 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the CheckBoxes property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 때의 CheckBoxes 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>로 설정 된 `true`, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>속성이 설정 되어 각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>에 포함 되어 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>첫 번째와 두 번째 이미지를 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>검사 되지 않은 선택 된 상태를 각각 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the CheckBoxes property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 표시 된 이미지 다음과 같은 상황이 발생 하는 경우 달라질 수 있습니다: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>0 또는 1 및 확인란 속성 부모 이외의 값으로 설정 되어 있는 노드의 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>로 설정 되어 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>설정 되지 않은 것을 나타낼 때-1을 자동으로 다시 설정 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 지정 된 인덱스 위치의 상태 이미지 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If CheckBoxes is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 확인란으로 설정 되어 있으면 `true` 다시 첫 번째 및 두 번째 등의 이미지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>각각 checked 또는 unchecked 상태를 나타내기 위해 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the CheckBoxes property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 실행 시 확인란 속성을 설정할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>핸들을 다시 만드는 (참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 컨트롤의 모양을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해 선택한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 제외 하 고 축소 하는 모든 트리 노드

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box is displayed next to each tree node in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>트리 뷰 컨트롤에서 각 트리 노드 옆에 확인란이 표시 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Collapses all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 모든 트리 노드를 축소합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method collapses all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 모두 축소 메서드 모두 축소는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>개체에 있는 모든 자식 트리 노드를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >의 상태는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>계속 되 면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method for a root tree node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어,를 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>루트 트리 노드에 대 한 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state.

trans-unit.source: Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| The region that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: 아이콘, 확인란, 더하기 및 빼기 기호, 및 노드를 연결 하는 선을 그려야 수동으로 필요한 경우. | 지역 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>속성은 선택 하는 노드를 클릭할 수 있는 영역은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 에 지정 된 글꼴을 사용 하 여 그린 경우 값이 차지 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: 이 적중 횟수 테스트 영역을 이라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 이 영역 외부에 그리면 가시 영역을 클릭할 때 노드를 선택 하는 사용자 고유의 코드를 제공 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hit test region corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> 를 사용할 경우이 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 해당 하는 적중 횟수 테스트 영역

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property encompasses the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>그러나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 의 전체 너비를 포함 하는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value and accessing its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 가져와서 적중 횟수 테스트 영역에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>값에 액세스 하 고 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음이 경계 내에서 노드의 적중 횟수 테스트 영역 그리거나 적중 횟수 테스트 코드에 직접 제공할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Note 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 전체에 대해 지정 된 글꼴을 사용 하 여 계산 되는 적중 횟수 테스트 영역 크기를 변경 되지 않습니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Enables the redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰의 다시 그리기를 활성화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 성능을 유지 하기 위해 항목을 한 번에 하나씩 추가 되는 동안는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method prevents the control from painting until the EndUpdate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>에서 사용 하기 위해 EndUpdate 메서드를 호출할 때까지 그리기 컨트롤 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤에 항목을 추가 하는 기본 방법은 사용 하는 것은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>메서드 트리 뷰를 트리 노드 항목의 배열입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 한 번에 한 항목을 추가 하려는 경우 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤이 추가 작업 동안 그려지지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow control the control to resume painting, call the EndUpdate method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 모든 트리 노드 트리 뷰에 추가 되 면 컨트롤 그리기를 다시 시작 하려면을 사용 하기 위해 EndUpdate 메서드를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Expands all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 모든 트리 노드를 확장합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 모두 확장 메서드는 모든 확장의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>개체에 있는 모든 자식 트리 노드를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >의 상태는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>계속 되 면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어,를 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>메서드 및 개별 루트 트리 노드가 축소 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again.
trans-unit.target: 자식 트리 노드 축소 되지 하 고 루트 트리 노드를 다시 확장 되 면 이전에 확장 상태로 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>메서드를 사용 하면 모든 트리 노드 축소 된 상태로 나타나는지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 전경색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 전경 <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> 컨트롤의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 값의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selection highlight spans the width of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 강조 표시 선택 영역이 트리 뷰 컨트롤의 너비로 확장 되는지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When FullRowSelect is `true`, a selection highlight spans the entire width of the tree view, display instead of the width of just the tree node label.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤에 할당 된 모든 하위 트리에 있는 비롯 하 여 트리 노드의 수를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `includeSubTrees` is `true`, the result is the number of all the tree nodes in the entire tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `includeSubTrees` 은 `true`, 결과 전체 형식 트리 구조에서 모든 트리 노드의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to count the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that the subtrees contain; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>계산 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> 하위 트리에 포함 되는 항목, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤에 할당 된 모든 하위 트리에 있는 비롯 하 여 트리 노드의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected tree node remains highlighted even when the tree view has lost the focus.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰에서 포커스가 사라질 때에 선택 된 트리 노드에서 강조 표시 된 상태 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 로이 속성이 설정 된 경우 `false`에서 선택 된 노드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤이 유지 현재 선택 영역와는 다른 색으로 강조 표시 된 경우 색은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤이 포커스를 잃을.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: 폼에서 다른 컨트롤을 클릭 하거나 다른 컨트롤을 이동할 때 표시 되는 사용자가 선택한 항목을 변경 하지 않으려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 경우 응용 프로그램의 액세스 고려 하는 것이 좋습니다 HideSelection 속성을 설정 하면 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected tree node is not highlighted when the tree view has lost the focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>선택 된 트리 노드에서 강조 표시 되지 경우 때 트리 뷰에서 포커스가 사라질; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: 주어진 지점의 노드 정보를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 지점에 있는지 여부를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>노드 내에서 포인터가 있는 같이 레이블 또는 이미지 영역 및.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.target: 노드 정보를 검색할 y 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.target: 노드 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 마우스 포인터가 위로 지나갈 때 트리 노드 레이블이으로 하이퍼링크 모양을 취할지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the HotTracking property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>속성이 `true`, HotTracking 속성이 적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the HotTracking property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때 the HotTracking 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, 각 위로 마우스 포인터 지나면서 하이퍼링크 모양 노드 레이블 취합니다 트리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> font style is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> is set to blue to make the label appear as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>글꼴 스타일에 적용 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>파랑 링크로 표시 레이블으로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>

trans-unit.source: The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 사용자의 운영 체제의 인터넷 설정에 따라 모양을 제어 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>마우스 포인터가; 위로 지나갈 때 트리 노드 레이블이으로 하이퍼링크 모양을에 걸리는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드에 표시 되는 기본 이미지의 이미지 목록 인덱스 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 값은 인덱스의는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>에 저장 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>에 할당 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>및 ImageIndex 속성은 함께; 무시 설정 된 경우 다른.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 설정한 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex-1로 자동 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 또는 ImageIndex를 설정 하는 경우, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>빈 문자열을 자동으로 설정 됩니다 ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the ImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 실행 시 ImageIndex 속성을 설정할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>핸들을 다시 만드는 (참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 컨트롤의 모양을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해 선택한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 제외 하 고 축소 하는 모든 트리 노드

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위치를 나타내는&0; 기반 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은&0;입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 인덱스가 0 보다 작은 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 각 노드에 대 한 기본 이미지의 키를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 않은 상태일 때 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 속성은 대/소문자 구분입니다.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the ImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>노드 선택 하지 않으면 속성이 표시 됩니다 ImageKey로 지정 된 이미지를 설정 하는 이미지에는 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 노드를 선택 하는 경우, 첫 번째 항목은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>속성은 함께 다른 무시가 설정 된 경우를 의미 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 속성을 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>속성이-1로 자동 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 또는 설정한 경우에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, ImageKey는 자동으로 속성이 빈 문자열 ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 각 노드에 대해 표시 되는 기본 이미지의 키 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 노드가 선택 되지 않은 상태에 있을 때이 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> 를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 트리 노드에 사용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>속성 값 이외의 다른 모든 항목은 `null`, 첫 번째 <xref:System.Drawing.Image> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 에 저장 된</xref:System.Drawing.Image> 모든 트리 노드 표시</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 목록에서 이미지를 설정 하 여 또는 선택 하지 않은 노드에 대 한 표시는 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 개별 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>개체에서 설정 하 여 표시 되는 이미지를 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 각 설정은 해당 설정을 무시 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >.NET Framework 버전 1.1에에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>응용 프로그램 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 노드</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 에 표시 되지 않도록 이미지 수 없는 문제

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제를 해결 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>에 프로그램 `Main` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> 호출 직후</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 문제는 해결 된 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 값이-1 기본값에서 아직 변경 되지 않은 경우 예외를 throw 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 핸들이 생성 되기 전에 컨트롤 내부 기본값으로 값이-1 사용 하기 때문에입니다.

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: 이 내부 기본값 컨트롤이 래핑된 19의 자체 기본값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 각 자식 트리 노드 수준을 들 여 픽셀 거리입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 19입니다.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (see Remarks).

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than 32,000.

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the OnKeyDown method switches between selecting and clearing the check box when the user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>속성이 `true` 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `false`, OnKeyDown 메서드를 선택 하 고 스페이스바를 누르면 확인란의 선택을 취소 사이 전환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseHover method performs a hit test to see whether the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, and if it is, raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤 필요할 때 스크롤 막대 표시 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is located outside the control's client region.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은로 설정 하는 경우 `true`에 스크롤 막대가 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>컨트롤의 클라이언트 영역 외부에 있는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the Scrollable property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 실행 시 스크롤할 수 있는 속성을 설정할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>핸들을 다시 만드는 (참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 컨트롤의 모양을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>트리 뷰 컨트롤; 필요할 때 스크롤 막대를 표시 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드가 선택 된 경우 표시 되는 이미지의 이미지 목록 인덱스 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageIndex 값은 인덱스의는 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>에 저장 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>에 할당 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the SelectedImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 실행 시 SelectedImageIndex 속성을 설정할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>핸들을 다시 만드는 (참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 컨트롤의 모양을 업데이트 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해 선택한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 제외 하 고 축소 하는 모든 트리 노드

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위치를 나타내는&0;부터 시작 인덱스 값은 <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 할당 된 인덱스 값이&0; 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 때 표시 되는 기본 이미지의 키를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> 선택 된 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have a selected image set, the image specified by the SelectedImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>노드 선택 하지 않으면 속성이 표시 됩니다 SelectedImageKey로 지정 된 이미지를 설정 하는 선택한 이미지에는 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageKey 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성은 함께; 무시 설정 된 경우 다른.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectedImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageKey 속성을 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>속성이-1로 자동 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property, the SelectedImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 또는 설정한 경우에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>는 SelectedImageKey 자동으로 속성이 빈 문자열 ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤에서 현재 선택 되어 있는 트리 노드를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is currently selected, the SelectedNode property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 없는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>는 SelectedNode 속성은 현재 선택 된 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the specified node is scrolled into view and any parent nodes are expanded so that the specified node is visible.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 지정된 된 노드 보기와 모든 부모 노드가 지정된 된 노드를 볼 수 있도록 확장 되어으로 스크롤됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When the parent node or any ancestor node of the selected node is collapsed either programmatically or through user action, the collapsed node becomes the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 작업을 통해 또는 부모 노드 또는 선택 된 노드의 상위 노드를 축소 하거나 프로그래밍 방식으로 축소 된 노드는 선택 된 노드를 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> 트리 뷰 컨트롤에서 현재 선택 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰 컨트롤의 트리 노드 사이 선이 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If ShowLines is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ShowLines로 설정 되어 있으면 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>속성은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>트리 뷰 컨트롤의 트리 노드 사이 선이 그려집니다 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 마우스 포인터를 가리킬 때 도구 설명을 표시 되는지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: In order for ToolTips to be visible, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명 표시에 대 한 순서로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>마우스 포인터를 가리킬 때 도구 설명이 표시 되는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 자식 트리 노드를 포함 하는 트리 노드 옆에 있는 더하기 기호 (+) 및 빼기 기호 (-) 단추가 표시 되는지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우에만 루트 트리 노드 옆에 더하기 및 빼기 기호 단추가 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>속성 값은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable.
trans-unit.target: 더하기 및 빼기 기호 단추가 표시 되지 않으면 시각적 표시가 없습니다 트리 노드가 자식 트리 노드를 포함 하 고 확장 가능한 나타내기 위해 존재 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 다음 두 번 클릭 해야 트리 노드를 자식 트리 노드를 확장 하거나 축소할 수 포함 되어 있는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>자식 트리 노드를 포함 하는 트리 노드 옆에 더하기 및 빼기 기호 단추가 표시 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰의 루트에 있는 트리 노드 사이 선이 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the ShowRootLines property is `false`, the plus-sign and minus-sign buttons will not appear next to the root tree nodes, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: ShowRootLines 속성이 `false`, 루트 트리 노드 옆에 더하기 및 빼기 기호 단추가 나타나지 것입니다 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>속성 아무런 효과가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>트리 뷰의 루트에 있는 트리 노드 사이 선이 그려집니다 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 항목을 정렬 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 기본 정렬 또는 지정 된 사용자 지정 정렬을 다시 적용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again.
trans-unit.target: 기존 노드에 텍스트가 변경 될 노드를 이동 하는 사용자가 항목을 다시 정렬 하려는 경우이 메서드를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 기본 정렬는 <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>기반 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>는 응용 프로그램이 지정한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 즉 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>동일 값을 사용 하 여 개체에 추가 된 순서에 보관 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제는 사용자 지정 정렬이 적용 될 경우 달라질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 트리 뷰의 트리 노드가 정렬 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When Sorted is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects are sorted in alphabetical order by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Sorted로 설정 되 면 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>사전순으로 정렬 되는 개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You should always use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> to maintain performance when you add a large quantity of items to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>많은 양의 정렬 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> 하는 항목을 추가 하면 성능을 유지</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> 하 고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> 항상 사용 해야

trans-unit.source: When the text of an existing node is changed, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> to resort the items.
trans-unit.target: 호출 해야 하는 기존 노드의 텍스트 변경 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>텍스트가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 기본 정렬는 <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>기반 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>는 응용 프로그램이 지정한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 즉 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>동일 값을 사용 하 여 개체에 추가 된 순서에 보관 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>트리 뷰의 트리 노드가 정렬 되어; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: 상태를 나타내는 데 사용 되는 이미지 목록을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 와 해당 노드가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To indicate the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, set the StateImageList property and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, StateImageList 속성을 설정 하 고 또한 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>각 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 에 대 한 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> 의 상태를 표시

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 상태 이미지에 표시 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>기본적으로 16 x 16 픽셀.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the StateImageList will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>는 StateImageList의 이미지가 표시 되는 방식에 영향을 미치지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true` and the StateImageList property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the StateImageList to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 상태 이미지 크기를 조정할 시스템 DPI 설정에 따라 app.config 파일에 다음 항목이 포함 되어 있으면: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>로 설정 되어 `true` 및 속성이 설정 되어 각 StateImageList <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>에 포함 되어 있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>검사 되지 않은 선택 된 상태를 각각 나타냅니다 StateImageList에서 첫 번째 및 두 번째 이미지를 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageList property before you add nodes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set.
trans-unit.target: 노드를 추가 하기 전에 StateImageList 속성을 설정 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>상태 이미지가 상태 이미지를 갖지 않는 노드에 대 한 디자인 타임에 표시 되지 않도록 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> used for indicating the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> 의 상태를 나타내는 데는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> 와 해당 노드가 있습니다.
